titleStmt.title: To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty: the humble petition of the Lords and Commons now assembled in Parliament delivered at Colebrook, 10 Nov. 1642. by the Earls of Pembrooke and Nothumberland, Lord Wainman, M. Perpoint, and Sir Jo. Hippesley.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Includes: His Majesties answer to the foresaid petition, given to the committee at Colebrooke, Nov. 11. 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
